title: Gandhidham–Indore Weekly Express
text:
The 19335/19336 Gandhidham - Indore Weekly Express is an <a href="Express%20trains%20in%20India">express</a> train belonging to <a href="Western%20Railway%20zone">Western Railway zone</a> that runs between and . It is currently being operated with 19335/19336 train numbers on a weekly basis.
Coach Composition.
The train has standard ICF rakes with max speed of 110 kmph. The train consists of 16 coaches :
Service.
The 19335/Gandhidham - Indore Weekly Express runs with an average speed of 46 km/h and completes 806 km in 17 hrs 25 mins.
The 19336/Indore - Gandhidham Weekly Express runs with an average speed of 51 km/h and completes 806 km in 15 hrs 45 mins.
